I'm trying to crawl http://www.orcun.de which as far as I can tell is
completely flash-based.  I can't seem to get Heritrix to follow
through the links in the flash though.  It stops after crawling the
opening page, and won't download the swf file.  There is no
robots.txt, so it's not a restriction set there.

Any ideas?

Thanks,
Rob Eger
Local Matters, Inc.
